docs.name: Vocat API
docs.info: Vocat is a teaching and learning platform that facilitates qualitative and quantitative assessment of a range of media. Built as a collaboration between the Center for Teaching and Learning at Baruch College, City University of New York and Cast Iron Coding of Portland, Oregon, the tool is in active development.
docs.copyright: Copyright 2015 Baruch College, City University of New York

resources.name: Groups
resources.full_description: Groups are collections of students that are tied to a course. Groups may create submissions for group projects and/or open projects.

methods.name: index

apis.short_description: returns all groups for the given course

errors.description: The current user does not have read access for the given course.

examples:

[

      "id":810,

errors.description: The current user does not have read access for the given course.

methods.name: create

apis.short_description: creates a new group within a course

errors.description: The current user is not allowed to create groups in this course.
A Group or User was not found.
There was an error creating the group. Perhaps not all creators in the group are enrolled in the course?

params.name: course_id
params.description: The ID of the course to which the group belongs

params.name: creator_ids
params.description: An array containing the IDs of the users who belong to this group.
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

examples:
Sample Request:
{
  "course_id": 234,
  "name": "Test Group 1",
  "creator_ids": [4499, 4506, 4503]
}
Sample Response:

{
    "id": 830,
    "name": "Test Group 1",
    "creator_ids": [
        4499,
        4506,
        4503
    ],
    "course_id": 234,
    "first_name": "Test Group 1",
    "members": [
        "Claude Erdman",
        "Nigel Gulgowski",
        "Wilhelmine Hackett"
    ]
}

errors.description: The current user is not allowed to modify this group.
A Group or User was not found.
There was an error updating the group. Perhaps not all creators in the group are enrolled in the course?

params.name: course_id
params.description: The ID of the course to which the group belongs

params.name: creator_ids
params.description: An array containing the IDs of the users who belong to this group.
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

errors.description: The current user is not allowed to delete this group.

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of the group to be deleted
